title: Man in Tuxedo
description: A man dressed for a formal occasion, wearing a tuxedo.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in a tuxedo emoji is a dapper figure exuding sophistication and celebratory flair, complete with a crisp white shirt and a perfectly tied black bow tie. Apple's characteristic realistic lighting creates a polished, three-dimensional appearance, highlighting the sharp lines of the tuxedo and the smooth contours of the face. This emoji, with its elegant presentation on Apple devices, is ideal for signifying formal events, special occasions, or a sense of refined style and excitement.
